answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.Your symptoms could be due to an allergen. It could also be due to circulatory problems, temperature problems or a rash. You will need to see if any allergens are triggering this reaction. You may also need to notice if ‘cold’ is precipitating your symptoms, then it could be due to raynauds phenomenon. Diabetes Mellitus and Hypothyroidism could cause the symptoms described by you. A simple blood test could help detect diabetes and hypothyroidism. So, don't worry and discuss these options with your doctor.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
